import React, { PureComponent, createRef, Fragment } from 'react' import { Button, Popup } from 'semantic-ui-react' const style = { borderRadius: 0, opacity: 0.7, padding: '2em', } class Personaje extends PureComponent { state = {} contextRef = createRef() toggle = () => this.setState({ open: !this.state.open }) render() { const { personaje } = this.props return (

{personaje.name}

{personaje.origin.name}

 ) } } export default Personaje
